alerts.clearReset: Afei bɔkɔlɔ hɔ na wobesesa. Wopɛ sɛ wopɛ sɛnea?

alerts.uploadedSecurly: Nsi no mu baako bɛyɛ secured sɛ end-to-end encryption yɛ, enti Excalidraw server ne wɔn din a wɔreba no nti wɔnni mu.
alerts.loadSceneOverridePrompt: Ntete so no bɛtumi akyerɛ wɔn ni. Wopɛ sɛ woyi so?

alerts.confirmAddLibrary: Enni sɛ wobɔkɔlɔ shape(s) a {{numShapes}} yi wɔ w’akurobɔbɔ. Wopɛ sɛ wobesesa?

alerts.cannotRestoreFromImage: Enni sɛ bisa wɔn ni atamfo yi fael.
alerts.invalidSceneUrl: Enni sɛ bisa wɔn ni fa URL no a yɛ anigye wɔ Excalidraw JSON data.
alerts.resetLibrary: Afei bɔkɔlɔ w’akurobɔbɔ. Wopɛ sɛ wopɛ sɛnea?
alerts.invalidEncryptionKey: Nkyerɛase no yɛ wɔpaw sɛ 22 ahunu. Abɔn no ahyɛ.
alerts.collabOfflineWarning:
Ɛno ara kɔ. Wobɛ ma nkɔmbɔ ayi mu so!

errors.unsupportedFileType: Fael no kasa enni sɛ yɛbɛhye.
errors.imageInsertError: Enni sɛ bɔa hɔ. San braw.
errors.fileTooBig: Fael no yɛ too big. Kɔkɔbɔ na yɛde.
errors.svgImageInsertError: Enni sɛ bɔa SVG image. SVG markup no nni.
errors.cannotResolveCollabServer: Enni sɛ hwehwɛ server. Braw saa akyerɛw din.
errors.collabSaveFailed: Enni sɛ sesa backend database. Sɛ nkɔm nni so, sesa fael afa wɔ loke yi wɔ kyere bɔ.
errors.collabSaveFailed_sizeExceeded: Enni sɛ sesa backend database, nkorɔn no yɛ too big. Sɛ nkɔm nni so, sesa fael afa wɔ loke yi wɔ kyere bɔ.

brave_measure_text_error.start: Sɛ obi ka wo ho a, wobɛyɛ Brave brawsa yi a,

toolBar.lock: Kɔ kasa ho firi sɛ woayi so afa
toolBar.penMode: Pen mode - Nnipa biara nni tɔɔch
toolBar.link: Bɔnkɔ / Nkɔmhyɛ link ho afa nantew

hints.canvasPanning: San brawsa, ma wɔpɛpɛ spacebar anaa mouse wheel while dragging, anaa yɛ yi aseɛ ntama tɔɔl
hints.linearElement: Klik sɛ wopɛ sɛ akyerɛ multiple points, drag sɛ wopɛ sɛ akyerɛ single line
hints.freeDraw: Klik ne drag, fata wɔ bere a wodidi
hints.text: Tip: Wo ho ntew aseɛ se wopɛ sɛ wobɔtɔɔl tɛkst mu
hints.text_selected: Double-click anaa push ENTER sɛ wobɔ edit tɛkst
hints.text_editing: Push Escape anaa CtrlOrCmd+ENTER sɛ wobedi editing no
hints.linearElementMulti: Klik wɔ last point anaa push Escape anaa Enter sɛ wobɛtumi aseɛ
hints.lockAngle: Wo bɛkɔnkyerɛ angle bɔ afa shift
hints.resize: Wo bɛkɔnkyerɛ proportions afa shift sɛ wobɛkɔakyekyere, kɔkɔbɔ ne ALT sɛ wobɛkɔakyekyere wɔ center so
hints.resizeImage:
Wo bɛkɔakyekyere frɛɛ afa shift,
kɔkɔbɔ ne ALT sɛ wobɛkɔakyekyere wɔ center so
hints.rotate: Wo bɛkɔnkyerɛ angles afa shift sɛ wobɛkɔbira
hints.lineEditor_info: Gyae CtrlOrCmd anaa double-click anaa push CtrlOrCmd + Enter sɛ wobɔ edit points
hints.lineEditor_pointSelected:
Push Delete sɛ wo pese point(s),
CtrlOrCmd+D sɛ wobɔ duplicate, anaa drag sɛ wobɛyɛ
hints.lineEditor_nothingSelected:
Pepa point afa edit (gyae SHIFT sɛ wobɔ pese nni),
anɔpa Alt anaa klik sɛ wo pese points foforo
hints.placeImage: Klik sɛ wobɔ image, anaa klik ne drag sɛ woasetɔ ayi mu
hints.publishLibrary: Bɔkɔlɔ wo din nsa frɛ wɔn
hints.deepBoxSelect: Gyae CtrlOrCmd sɛ wobɔ box select, anaa sɛ wobɔyɛ so tɔɔl
hints.eraserRevert: Gyae Alt sɛ wobɔ revert elements a wodi mark sɛ wobɔ pese
hints.firefox_clipboard_write: Sɛ yɛda hɔ a, hwehwɛ setting yi a "dom.events.asyncClipboard.clipboardItem" flag yɛ "true". Sɛ wobɛhyɛ browser flags a Firefox, tɔ adwuma fa "about:config" page.

canvasError.canvasTooBig: Canvas no mpo yɛ too big.
canvasError.canvasTooBigTip: Tip: mma farthest elements yi a pae mu apae small small.

errorSplash.clearCanvasMessage: Sɛ san brawsa no enni nti, san
errorSplash.clearCanvasCaveat: Sɛ wosan no, ɛwɔ loss of work mu
errorSplash.trackedToSentry_post: adi na wɔn system no so de adi.
errorSplash.openIssueMessage_pre: Yɛaka sɛ aka wo scene information no na anka a, yɛbɛma wo
errorSplash.openIssueMessage_post: Mesrɛ wo sɛ wobɔ copy ne paste information yi wɔ GitHub issue no mu.

roomDialog.desc_intro: Wo pɛ sɛ wobɔ nhyiam afe a a, wo pɛ sɛ obiara bɔɔ wo.
roomDialog.desc_privacy: Nnye, sɛhyɛn yi bɛyɛ secure sɛ end-to-end encryption, enti wo bɔ sɛnea wo pɛ sɛ wobɔ. Sɛn na yɛbɛto mu, server yɛ yɛn akyekyede no ho bɛn na wɔbɛyɛ.
roomDialog.desc_inProgressIntro: Nhyiam-collaboration session no de yɛ so kɔ.
roomDialog.desc_shareLink: Share yi link yi ne obiara a wobɔ nhyiam no ho.
roomDialog.desc_exitSession: Nnom nhyiam no bɛtumi de wo so na, ɛnyɛ sɛ wobɔ yɛn scene no, locally. Saa ara nti, wonni effect sɛnea wobɔ wo kwan so no, na wonni sɛ obiara teɛ no nni sɛnea ɛbɛtumi baako no.
roomDialog.shareTitle: Join nhyiam-collaboration session a Excalidraw mu

exportDialog.disk_details: Bɔkɔlɔ scene data no wɔ fael mu a wobɛtumi afa later.
exportDialog.link_details: Bɔkɔlɔ wɔ link no so sɛ woapaeɛ.
exportDialog.excalidrawplus_description: Bɔkɔlɔ scene no wɔ Excalidraw+ workspace no mu.
exportDialog.excalidrawplus_exportError: Enni sɛ bɔkɔlɔ wɔ Excalidraw+ afe a ni no mu...

helpDialog.deepBoxSelect: Deep select wɔ box no mu, anaa prevent dragging

publishDialog.title: Bɔkɔlɔ library

placeholder.libraryDesc: Description nea wobɛtumi adi no aseɛ wɔn a wobɛtumi abɛyɛ

noteDescription.pre: Bɔkɔlɔ library no a wotumi submit wɔ
noteDescription.post: sɛ wɔn a wobɛyɛn ho anaa wobɛtumi abɛyɛ wɔn dwumadini no mu.

noteGuidelines.pre: Library no bɛyɛ secure sɛ yɛtumi approve afe a. Ma no kasa
noteGuidelines.post: sɛ woasa. Wo bɛde GitHub account bɛma wo muhonoo anaa wo kyere sɛ obiara yɛntumi nni.

noteLicense.pre: Sɛ wobɔ submit, woayɛ sɛ library no bɛbɔ nea yɛkae sɛ
noteLicense.post: a which in short means anyone can use them without restrictions.

publishDialog.noteItems: Kɔkɔbɔ a wo bɛtumi submit wɔn a, wɔde din foforo ma wɔhyɛ so no. Nkontompo foforo a wɔbɛbɔ wɔn no mu:
publishDialog.atleastOneLibItem: Sum anaa chɛnchɛn at least one library item sɛ woagye di nsɛm no
publishDialog.republishWarning: Note: abakɔsɛ wɔn a woapaeɛ wɔ no yɛ sɛ wobɔ resubmit items a wobɔ so no. Wobɛtumi submit wɔn a wobɔ update an existing library a na submission no.

publishSuccessDialog.title: Library submitted
publishSuccessDialog.content: Medaase {{authorName}}. Wo library a wopɛ sɛ wobɔ submit no de wosɔreɛ ho ma review. Wobɛtumi antumi

confirmDialog.removeItemsFromLib: Yi nkonsɔnkonsɔn adi sɛ kyerɛ library

encrypted.tooltip: Wo nsɛm bɛyɛ secure sɛ end-to-end encryption, enti Excalidraw's servers no yɛ saa wonni.
encrypted.link: Blog post afa end-to-end encryption a Excalidraw mu
